import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import Modal from 'react-modal'; function Summary() { const location = useLocation(); const [before,after]= useState(true); return (
{/*

{location.state.id}

*/}

Name: {location.state.name}

Show Name: {location.state.name}

Rating : {location.state.rating}

Summary :

{location.state.summary}

Book Ticket
) } export default Summary
